creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: maroon, dark red, gold and white silk embroidery (scorpion or tree design) on black velvet, front and back; wide cuff at top; solid embroidery in thin black; knotted cord near top opening; slit down one side of cuff; tight overcast edge on three closed sides
dimension:
8 1/2 x 5 5/8 in. (21.59 x 14.29 cm)
6 3/4 in. (17.15 cm) (object part, cord)
title: Bag
